RelatedSentence: Two Brantford men are facing multiple charges relating to a violent attack early Saturday morning .
Police say James Carpenter , 29 , Justin Webber , 27 , and a third man forced their way into a residence on Eagle Avenue .
Police say James Carpenter , 29 , Justin Webber , 27 , and a third man forced their way into a residence on Eagle Avenue .
They assaulted the residents and killed two kittens by stomping on them .

Police were called the residence around 2:30 a.m. On their arrival , they were confronted by an intoxicated man .
Police say the man punched a cruiser and then assaulted an officer .

While in police custody , the man kicked out the rear window of the police cruiser and later damaged a cell at the Brantford Police Station .

Police are still looking for the third man .
